description.value:
A conjured shower of glistening slime takes humanoid shape at your command, spraying your foes with caustic acid.

At-Will âœ¦ Acid, Augmentable, Conjuration, Implement, Psionic

Standard Action • Ranged 10

Effect: You conjure an ectoplasmic servant in an unoccupied square within range. The servant lasts until the end of your next turn or until expended. Any enemy that enters the servant's space or ends its turn there takes acid damage equal to your Charisma modifier (an enemy can take this damage only once per turn). In addition, you can use the Ectoplasmic Servant Attack power.

Augment 1

Effect: You conjure an ectoplasmic servant as above, and any enemy that starts its turn in or adjacent to the servant's space is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 89.

effect.detail: You conjure an ectoplasmic servant in an unoccupied square within range. The servant lasts until the end of your next turn or until expended. Any enemy that enters the servant's space or ends its turn there takes acid damage equal to your Charisma modifier (an enemy can take this damage only once per turn). In addition, you can use the Ectoplasmic Servant Attack power.

system.special: Effect 2: You conjure an ectoplasmic servant as above, and any enemy that starts its turn in or adjacent to the servant's space is slowed until the end of your next turn.
system.chatFlavor: A conjured shower of glistening slime takes humanoid shape at your command, spraying your foes with caustic acid.
